install.name: Sponsored Links
install.author: Joomlaspan
install.description:
EDITOR'S PICK: The best simple solution for implementing Google AdSense ads in Joomla!

Our Request: If you like this extension, PLEASE vote for it on Joomla! Extensions Directory!

Please DONATE to support the development of this module!

if you haven't so far...

param.name: @spacer
param.default: IP Block and other advanced optional features are included in Advanced Parameters below

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_css
param.label: Div CSS codes
param.description: Input any css code that you want here. By default, width and height are autoadjusted based on the ad format that you choose.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_client
param.label: Publisher ID
param.description: Please type your Publisher ID provided by Google AdSense. It is an alphanumerical string like pub-123456789876543. If you do not have an ID, please click on the - SignUp for AdSense - link on the left.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_channel
param.label: Channel number
param.description: Type the channel number that you may have set in Google AdSense. It is a numerical string like 54656789 and NOT any text string that you can choose.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_type
param.label: Ad Type
param.description: Choose the ad types you would like to display on your page. If you are choosing Image Ads only option, plase use only these sizes: 728X90 - Leaderboard, 468X60 - Banner, 300X250 - Medium Rectangle, 160X600 - Wide Skyscraper and 120X600 - Skyscraper

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_uifeatures
param.label: Corner Styles
param.description: Optionally, choose from one of the pre-designed corner styles.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_format
param.label: Ad layout
param.description: Choose the ad format and size that you would like to display on your page.

param.name: joomlaspan_ip_block1
param.label: IP Block (Clicksafe) 1
param.description: Enter an IP number here that you wish to block Google Ads from.

param.name: joomlaspan_ip_block2
param.label: IP Block (Clicksafe) 2
param.description: Enter an IP number here that you wish to block Google Ads from.

param.name: joomlaspan_ip_block3
param.label: IP Block (Clicksafe) 3
param.description: Enter an IP number here that you wish to block Google Ads from.

param.name: joomlaspan_ip_block4
param.label: IP Block (Clicksafe) 4
param.description: Enter an IP number here that you wish to block Google Ads from.

param.name: joomlaspan_ip_block5
param.label: IP Block (Clicksafe) 5
param.description: Enter an IP number here that you wish to block Google Ads from.

param.name: ip_block_alt_code
param.label: Alternate code if IP blocked
param.description: Enter anything (text or html code) here to show when Google Ads are blocked in IPs as above.

param.name: joomlaspan_alternate_ad_url
param.label: Alternate Ad URL
param.description: Alternate Ad URL to specify other ads when no ads are available.

param.name: joomlaspan_alternate_color
param.label: Alternate Color
param.description: Alternate color when no ads are available, in hex, without #

param.name: @spacer
param.default: More color choices here, only if you want to use rotating colors
param.label: More...
param.description: Enter upto 3 additional colors in hex, without #, for activation of the Chameleon codes for AdSense! If you DO NOT want this option, leave them blank
